word_mean: 适应，调整，调节：调整人体各部以适应环境变化的机制或过程
在心理学上，指个体需要和环境要求间的和谐程度
在按摩疗法中，指对脊柱的推拿法，据称可使神经功能恢复正常
升降显微镜管，使受检物像进入适当焦点
牙科指于义齿完成和戴入口腔后所作的调整
使机床各部分达到能进入正常工作状态的操作。

sentence.Network_en: The dynamic of the market demands constant change and adjustment.
sentence.Network_cn: 市场要有活力，需要不断地改变和调整。

sentence.Network_en: Investment is up by 5.7% after adjustment for inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 针对通货膨胀作出调整之后投资上升了5.7%。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes happiness is just a matter of attitude adjustment.--Susan Gale
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候，幸福只需转变一下自己的态度。

entry.def: An adjustment is a small change that is made to something such as a machine or a way of doing something.

example.ex: Compensation could be made by adjustments to taxation...
example.tran: 通过调整税收可以作出补偿。

example.ex: Investment is up by 5.7% after adjustment for inflation.
example.tran: 针对通货膨胀作出调整之后投资上升了5.7%。

entry.def: An adjustment is a change in a person's behaviour or thinking.

example.ex: He will have to make major adjustments to his thinking if he is to survive in office.
example.tran: 要想保住这份工作，他就必须在观念上作出重大的转变。

means.word_mean: 1. making or becoming suitable; adjusting to circumstances
2. the act of making something different (as e.g. the size of a garment)
3. the act of adjusting something to match a standard
4. the process of adapting to something (such as environmental conditions)
5. an amount added or deducted on the basis of qualifying circumstances;

auth_sentence.content: I predict that humanity will have a huge adjustment.
auth_sentence.res_content: I predict that humanity will have a huge adjustment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I predict that humanity will have a huge adjustment.

auth_sentence.content: Fiscal adjustment in 2011 may drag the economy down.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fiscal adjustment in 2011 may drag the economy down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fiscal adjustment in 2011 may drag the economy down.

auth_sentence.content: But Mr. Thomas found the adjustment to civilian work challenging.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Mr. Thomas found the adjustment to civilian work challenging.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Mr. Thomas found the adjustment to civilian work challenging.

sentences.en: a few minor adjustments to the timetable
sentences.cn: 对时间表作的几项微调

sentences.en: The company made an adjustment in my salary.
sentences.cn: 公司对我的薪金作了调整。
某些合理的调整似乎是可取的。

sentences.en: The mechanic made the necessary adjustments to the engine.
sentences.cn: 机械师对发动机作了必要的调整。

sentences.en: They should make adjustment to the new environment.
sentences.cn: 他们应进行调整以适应新环境。

sentences.en: The process of adjustment to life in another country can be very difficult.
sentences.cn: 适应另一国家的生活可能会非常困难。
